MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML6 postcode area of Airdrie, affecting properties in Wallace street and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 01:40pm to safely carry out repairs on our electrical equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:05pm on Wednesday, 07 April 2021
